Design of Experiments Jordi Cuadros, Laura Fernández Ruano, Vanessa Serrano 2022-07-27 Chapter 1 About This material is being developed by Jordi Cuadros (https://orcid.org/0000-0001-6513-9140), Laura Fernández Ruano (https://orcid.org/0000-0001-9879-781X) and Vanessa Serrano (https://orcid.org/0000-0001-6572-0680) as a reference material for a Master’s course in Design of Experiments at IQS Universitat Ramon Llull (http://www.iqs.url.edu) in Barcelona, Spain. First version (a draft) was published on September 2022. Current version (Ubuntu-style) is 22.07.27 1.1 License and contributing This work is licensed under a Creative Common BY-SA unported license. Should you be interested in contributing to this work, suggest corrections or improvements, or just say thanks, feel free to reach the authors at jordi.cuadros@iqs.url.edu.

Chapter 2 Experimenting Experimenting is a common task in any scientific endeavor. However, and this is not uncommon, being a common task does not warrant a full comprehension of it.
